name: Last Heroes 4
description:
Presentation
Last Heroes is an RPG developed by Warfare Studios, the team already behind Vagrant Hearts, Ashes of Immortality, Valiant: Resurrection and Midnight's Blessing. Plot
The finale to the Last Heroes Saga!

Join Amelia, Viktor, Roland and Vanessa in the final chapter of this exciting journey, as they finally find out the true whereabouts of Amelia's mother. Other Last Heroes Games
